title: Noi's Thai Imbiss
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu is in German only. As with most Thai food restaurants, there are usually several vegetarian suitable dishes, and vegan when ask to omit egg: V1 6 vegetarian spring rolls, S6 vegetarian soup, pad Thai vegetarian (egg), N4 pad Thai vegetarian with egg + tofu, pad phak rummit with tofu (ask to omit oyster sauce), H10 khao pad vegetarian.
